summary: This document is an email forwarding interview notes from an interview with Amanda Cramer conducted by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. It indicates ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case in early 2021.

persons.name: Amanda Cramer
persons.context: Subject of interview notes attached to the email, indicating she was interviewed by prosecutors.

events.title: Interview of Amanda Cramer
events.description: An interview was conducted with Amanda Cramer, with notes attached to this correspondence.

locations.name: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address of the Assistant United States Attorney's office

keyFacts: Investigative activity in the Epstein case was ongoing as of February 2021.
An interview was conducted with a witness named Amanda Cramer.
The Southern District of New York was involved in this investigative work.
